name: getpeople
description: Fetch a list of Power BI influencers from a specified page using the given API key.

page.description: The page number to request the list of influencers from.

name: email_checker
description: Checks whether the provided email is valid or disposable using the RapidAPI service.

email.description: The email address to be verified.

name: get_emails
description: Retrieve emails from a given URL using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

url.description: The URL from which to extract email addresses.

name: validate_email
description: Validate an email address using the "Validate Email" API.

email.description: The email address to be validated.

name: role_account
description: Check if a given domain has a role-based email account using the Fast Email Verifier API.

domain.description: The domain name to check for role-based email accounts.

name: getusers
description: Fetches user information from the RapidAPI user-demo service, optionally filtered by email and name.

email.description: Email address to filter the users.

name: mailcheck
description: Checks if an email domain is valid or a disposable/temporary address.

domain.description: The email or domain to check for validity. It is recommended to enter just the domain for user privacy.

name: email
description: Validates the given email address using the RapidAPI email validation service.

email.description: The email address that needs to be validated.

name: readmail
description: Fetches mail data from the provided mail ID using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

mailid.description: The ID of the mail to retrieve.

name: emailverification
description: Verifies an email address using the Fast Email Verifier API.

emailsimple.description: The email address to be verified. Defaults to 'mbavazijoshua@gmail.com'.

name: verify_email
description: Verify the validity of an email address using the RapidAPI email verification service.

email.description: The email address to be verified.

name: freedomain
description: Checks whether a domain is available for free using the Fast Email Verifier API.

domain.description: The domain name to be checked for availability.

name: get_the_mx_records
description: Fetches the MX (Mail Exchange) records for a given email address using the RapidAPI service.

email.description: The email address for which to retrieve MX records.

name: bouncer_email_checker
description: Validates an email address using the Bouncer Email Checker API.

email.description: The email address to be validated.

name: inbox
description: Fetches the inbox messages for a given temporary email address using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

email.description: The temporary email address for which to fetch the inbox messages.

name: validate_domain_or_email_address
description: Validates whether the given input is a disposable domain or email address using the RapidAPI Disposable Email Validation service.

validate.description: The domain or email address to be validated.

name: email_validate
description: Validate a single email address in real-time using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

email.description: The email address to be validated.

name: email_verifier
description: Verifies the validity of an email address using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

email.description: The email address to be verified.

name: check_for_disposable_emails
description: Checks if the given email address is disposable or temporary using the Email Existence Validator API.

email.description: The email address to check for disposability.

name: domain
description: Checks if a given domain is disposable using the Mailcheck API.

domain.description: The domain to check for disposability.

name: getteam
description: Fetches the details of an NHL team based on the provided team ID, with optional query parameters to expand the response and specify the season.

expand.description: Additional data to expand in the response. Defaults to 'team.roster'.

season.description: The specific season for which to return team data. Defaults to 20172018.

name: getgroups
description: Fetches the WhatsApp groups associated with the provided phone ID using the Maytapi API.

phone_id.description: The ID of the phone whose WhatsApp groups are to be fetched.

name: validate
description: Validates a given phone number from any country using the RapidAPI phone number validation service.

country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code in capital letters. This is optional if `number` is in E.164 format. Defaults to 'UY'.

name: validate_email_address
description: Validate if an email address is deliverable and working using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

email.description: The email address to be validated.

name: verify_the_existence_of_email
description: Verifies the existence of an email address using the Email Existence Validator API.

name: email_validate_regex
description: Validates an email address using the Email Validator API.

email.description: The email address to be validated.

name: email_endpoint
description: Queries an email bounce detection API to check the deliverability status of an email address.

email_string.description: The email address to be checked.

name: disposable_domain_and_suggest_domain
description: Checks if the given domain is disposable and provides a suggested alternative domain.

name: get_status
description: Retrieve the delivery status report for a given message ID using the provided API key.

msg_id.description: The unique identifier of the SMS message. This can be obtained by setting the parameter `JSON`, `return_msg_id` or `details` to `1` when sending the SMS via the API. It can also be retrieved from the message journal in the user area.

name: normalize
description: Normalizes the given email address using the RapidAPI email utilities service.

email.description: The email address to be normalized.

name: emailverifications
description: Verifies a list of email addresses using the Fast Email Verifier API.

emailsimple.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses to verify. Default is 'mbavazijoshua@gmail.com,apisolution@gmail.com'.

name: verify_an_email
description: Verifies a single email address using the Blaze Verify API. If a verification request takes longer than the specified timeout, retries are allowed for up to 5 minutes. The verification result is returned once available.

email.description: The email address to be verified.

accept_all.description: Whether to perform an accept-all check, which can increase response time. Default is False.

smtp.description: Whether to include the SMTP step in the verification, which can also increase response time. Default is True.

timeout.description: The timeout in seconds to wait for a response. Minimum is 2, and maximum is 30. Default is 5.

name: check_email
description: Validates an email address using the RapidAPI Email Checker and Validator service.

name: v1_verify
description: Validates an email address using the QuickEmailVerification API.

name: gettoken
description: Generates and retrieves a token for the given user ID using the specified RapidAPI key.

userid.description: The user ID for which the token is to be generated.

name: email_validation
description: Validates whether a given email domain is disposable using the RapidAPI service.

domain.description: The email domain to be validated.
